in_progress.based_on_local_workspace: boolean - Whether the run is based on local workspace
in_progress.branch: string - Git branch for the run
in_progress.command: string - Command executed for the run

commit.author: string - Commit author
commit.exist_on_tracked_branch: boolean - Whether the commit exists on the tracked branch
commit.pull_request_id: integer - Pull request ID if the commit is from a PR

in_progress.drift_detection: boolean - Whether this is a drift detection run
in_progress.triggered_by: string - Who or what triggered the run

pull_request.action_initiator: string - Who initiated this PR action
pull_request.author: string - PR author

base.author: string - Commit author
base.exist_on_tracked_branch: boolean - Whether the commit exists on the tracked branch
base.pull_request_id: integer - Pull request ID if the commit is from a PR

pull_request.closed: boolean - Whether the PR is closed
pull_request.draft: boolean - Whether this is a draft PR

head.author: string - Commit author
head.exist_on_tracked_branch: boolean - Whether the commit exists on the tracked branch
head.pull_request_id: integer - Pull request ID if the commit is from a PR

pull_request.head_owner: string - Owner of the head repository
pull_request.title: string - PR title
pull_request.approved: boolean - Whether the PR is approved
pull_request.mergeable: boolean - Whether the PR is mergeable
pull_request.undiverged: boolean - Whether the PR is undiverged

vcs_integration.is_default: boolean - Whether this is the default integration
vcs_integration.name: string - VCS integration name

stack.administrative: boolean - Whether the stack is administrative
stack.branch: string - Git branch tracked by this stack
stack.locked_by: string - User who locked the stack, if any
stack.name: string - Stack display name
stack.terraform_version: string - Terraform version used by the stack

tracked_commit.author: string - Commit author
tracked_commit.exist_on_tracked_branch: boolean - Whether the commit exists on the tracked branch
tracked_commit.pull_request_id: integer - Pull request ID if the commit is from a PR

worker_pool.id: string - Worker pool identifier (null for public pool)
worker_pool.name: string - Worker pool name (null for public pool)
worker_pool.public: boolean - Whether this is the public worker pool
